info.title: Purchase Order API for Etendo ERP
info.description:
The Purchase Order API is designed to facilitate the creation and management of purchase orders within the Etendo ERP system. It provides endpoints for accessing and manipulating data related to business partners (suppliers), products, and other essential information required to generate purchase orders efficiently.

## Features

- **Business Partner Information**: Retrieve detailed information about business partners (suppliers), including contact details, addresses, and transaction histories.
- **Product Catalog**: Access a comprehensive list of products, including descriptions, pricing, and stock levels.
- **Order Management**: Create, update, and view purchase orders, along with the ability to add products to orders and specify quantities.
- **Other entities**: The API is capable to get other data needed for the purcharse order/invoice importation. Remember, the available Entities are Product, BusinesPartner, Order and OrderLine. 
# Entities Available
  - Product: Products in Availables.
  - BusinessPartner: Suppliers loaded in the system.
  - Order: Order header, which contains the general information of the purchase order.
  - OrderLine: Order line, each one stores one item of the order, with product and quantity information. The lines belong to an order header. Several lines can belong to the same header.

tags.name: Purchase
tags.description: Endpoints related to purchase orders and related entities

get.summary: Search a entity by similarity in his name in Etendo
get.description:
This endpoint allow to search a entity by similarity in his name in Etendo. The entityName query parameter is required and must be a valid entity name. The searchTerm query parameter is required and must be a valid string.
The available entities for this endpoint are:
  - Product: Products in Availables.
  - BusinessPartner: Suppliers loaded in the system. 
 Example of use: /sws/com.etendoerp.copilot.openapi.purchase.copilotws/searchBySimilarity?entityName=Product&searchTerm=Water%20Bottle for search a product with the name 'Water Bottle'. For this endpoint, the parameters must be URL encoded, because the parameters are in the query string.

parameters.name: entityName
parameters.description: Defines of which type is the entity to Search.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Only filters by entities. Returns the specified entity from the model.

404.description: Wrong Endpoint, the correct endpoint is /sws/com.etendoerp.copilot.openapi.purchase.copilotws/searchBySimilarity

get.summary: Get a Product detailed information, searching by ID, returning the complete information of the Product. Remember, the ids inside the response are the ids that may be used in the order creation. Never omit information of the response.

parameters.name: recordID
parameters.description: ID of the record to be obtained.

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: Include identifiers.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields to select separated by commas.

parameters.name: noActive
parameters.description: If it is true, it will also search the non-active records.

get.summary: Get a Business Partner (Supplier / Vendor) record by ID

parameters.name: recordID
parameters.description: ID of the record to be obtained.

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: Include identifiers.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields to select separated by commas.

parameters.name: noActive
parameters.description: If it is true, it will also search the non-active records.

_identifier.description: A human-readable identifier for the business partner.

_entityName.description: The name of the entity, which should be 'BusinessPartner'.

id.description: The unique identifier for the business partner.

client.description: Client identifier to which the business partner belongs.

organization.description: Organization identifier to which the business partner is associated.

active.description: Indicates whether the business partner is active.

creationDate.description: The date and time when the business partner was created.

createdBy.description: Identifier of the user who created the business partner record.

createdBy$_identifier.description: Human-readable name of the user who created the business partner.

updated.description: The date and time when the business partner was last updated.

updatedBy.description: Identifier of the user who last updated the business partner record.

updatedBy$_identifier.description: Human-readable name of the user who last updated the business partner.

searchKey.description: A unique search key or code for the business partner.

name.description: The name of the business partner.

name2.description: An additional name or alias for the business partner.

description.description: A description of the business partner.

summaryLevel.description: Indicates if the business partner is a summary level (grouping of several business partners).

businessPartnerCategory.description: Identifier for the business partner category.

businessPartnerCategory$_identifier.description: Human-readable name of the business partner category.

oneTimeTransaction.description: Indicates if the business partner is used for one-time transactions.

potentialCustomer.description: Indicates if the business partner is a potential customer.

vendor.description: Indicates if the business partner is a vendor.

customer.description: Indicates if the business partner is a customer.

employee.description: Indicates if the business partner is an employee.

isSalesRepresentative.description: Indicates if the business partner is a sales representative.

referenceNo.description: A reference number for the business partner.

dUNS.description: Dun & Bradstreet number of the business partner.

uRL.description: URL or website of the business partner.

language.description: Default language of the business partner.

language$_identifier.description: Human-readable name of the default language.

taxID.description: Tax identification number of the business partner.

taxExempt.description: Indicates if the business partner is exempt from tax.

volumeOfSales.description: Volume of sales associated with the business partner.

noOfEmployees.description: Number of employees in the business partner organization.

nAICSSIC.description: North American Industry Classification System or Standard Industrial Classification code.

dateOfFirstSale.description: Date of the first sale to or purchase from the business partner.

acquisitionCost.description: Cost of acquiring the business partner as a customer or vendor.

expectedLifetimeRevenue.description: Expected lifetime revenue from the business partner.

lifetimeRevenueToDate.description: Lifetime revenue to date from the business partner.

share.description: Share of business or market share associated with the business partner.

formOfPayment.description: Preferred form of payment for the business partner.

creditLimit.description: Credit limit assigned to the business partner.

creditUsed.description: Amount of credit used by the business partner.

paymentTerms.description: Payment terms associated with the business partner.

priceList.description: Price list identifier for the business partner.

printDiscount.description: Indicates if discounts are printed on invoices for the business partner.

orderDescription.description: Description for orders placed by the business partner.

orderReference.description: Reference for orders placed by the business partner.

pOFormOfPayment.description: Form of payment for purchase orders.

purchasePricelist.description: Pricelist for purchases made by the business partner.

purchasePricelist$_identifier.description: Human-readable name of the purchase pricelist.

pOPaymentTerms$_identifier.description: Human-readable description of the payment terms for purchase orders.

numberOfCopies.description: Number of copies to be printed for documents.

greeting.description: Greeting or salutation for the business partner.

invoiceTerms.description: Terms for invoicing the business partner.

deliveryTerms.description: Delivery terms for the business partner.

deliveryMethod.description: Method of delivery for goods and services.

salesRepresentative.description: Sales representative associated with the business partner.

partnerParent.description: Parent entity of the business partner, if any.

creditStatus.description: Credit status of the business partner.

forcedOrg.description: Organization that is forced for transactions with the business partner.

pricesShownInOrder.description: Indicates if prices are shown in orders for the business partner.

invoiceGrouping.description: Grouping code for invoices to the business partner.

maturityDate1.description: First maturity date for payments to/from the business partner.

maturityDate2.description: Second maturity date for payments to/from the business partner.

maturityDate3.description: Third maturity date for payments to/from the business partner.

operator.description: Indicates if the business partner is an operator.

uPCEAN.description: UPC/EAN code associated with the business partner.

salaryCategory.description: Salary category for employees within the business partner entity.

invoicePrintformat.description: Print format for invoices issued to the business partner.

consumptionDays.description: Number of consumption days for the business partner.

bankAccount.description: Bank account details for the business partner.

taxCategory.description: Tax category associated with the business partner.

taxCategory$_identifier.description: Human-readable name of the tax category.

pOMaturityDate1.description: First maturity date for purchase order payments.

pOMaturityDate2.description: Second maturity date for purchase order payments.

pOMaturityDate3.description: Third maturity date for purchase order payments.

transactionalBankAccount.description: Transactional bank account for the business partner.

sOBPTaxCategory.description: Special tax category for the business partner.

fiscalcode.description: Fiscal code for the business partner.

isofiscalcode.description: ISO fiscal code for the business partner.

paymentMethod.description: Payment method for the business partner.

pOPaymentMethod$_identifier.description: Human-readable name of the payment method for purchase orders.

account.description: Account details for the business partner.

pOFinancialAccount$_identifier.description: Human-readable name of the financial account for purchase orders.

customerBlocking.description: Indicates if the business partner is blocked from being a customer.

vendorBlocking.description: Indicates if the business partner is blocked from being a vendor.

paymentIn.description: Indicates if the business partner is allowed to make payments in.

paymentOut.description: Indicates if the business partner is allowed to make payments out.

salesInvoice.description: Indicates if the business partner is associated with sales invoices.

purchaseInvoice.description: Indicates if the business partner is associated with purchase invoices.

salesOrder.description: Indicates if the business partner is associated with sales orders.

purchaseOrder.description: Indicates if the business partner is associated with purchase orders.

goodsShipment.description: Indicates if the business partner is associated with goods shipments.

goodsReceipt.description: Indicates if the business partner is associated with goods receipts.

cashVAT.description: Indicates if the business partner is subject to cash VAT.

setNewCurrency.description: Indicates if a new currency is set for the business partner.

currency.description: Currency code for transactions with the business partner.

birthPlace.description: Place of birth for the business partner.

smfijProject.description: Project code associated with the business partner.

isCustomerConsent.description: Indicates if there is customer consent for processing data.

parameters.name: firstResult
parameters.description: First result, pagination use.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Total number of results, used for pagination. E.g. If firstResult is 0, and maxResults is 4, then it will return 4 records starting the count from 0 (Records 0, 1, 2 and 3). Therefore, if firstResult is 10 and maxResults is 3, it will return the records 10, 11 and 12

parameters.name: distinct
parameters.description: Only filters by entities. Returns the specified entity from the model.

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: Include identifiers.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The "Q" parameter allows you to apply clauses to filter records based on specific criteria. For more information check the following documentation.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Clause order by in HQL. Field/s with which to sort the results.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields to select separated by commas.

parameters.name: noActive
parameters.description: If it is true, non-active records will also be returned.

orderDate.description: The date when the order is placed. This value must be provided by the user, and it should be the same as scheduledDeliveryDate and accountingDate.

scheduledDeliveryDate.description: The scheduled delivery date for the order, which should match the orderDate and accountingDate.

accountingDate.description: The accounting date for the order, which should be identical to orderDate and scheduledDeliveryDate.

orderReference.description: Reference for the order, typically  this info is provided when creating the order.

documentType.description: The type of document for the order. Use 'AB22CE8FFA5E4AF29F2AC90FCDD400D8' for this order.

transactionDocument.description: Transaction document for the order. Utilize 'AB22CE8FFA5E4AF29F2AC90FCDD400D8' for this transaction.

currency.description: Currency ID for currency in which the order is made. If reading from BusinessPartner, the currency can be obtained from the same, property: 'currency'.

paymentMethod.description: Payment method preferred from the supplier. Read this value from the BusinessPartner, property: 'pOPaymentMethod'. This property is not mandatory, but it is very useful to have it.

paymentTerms.description: Payment terms from the supplier. Read this value from the BusinessPartner, property: 'pOPaymentTerms'.

warehouse.description: Warehouse where the order will be stored. Use 'B2D40D8A5D644DD89E329DC297309055' for this order.

priceList.description: Price list from the supplier. Can be obtained from the BusinessPartner, property: 'purchasePricelist'.

salesTransaction.description: Indicates if the order is a sales transaction. In this case, it is not. Always false.

eTCPOPPFromCopilot.description: Indicates if the order is created from Copilot. Use always true.

parameters.name: firstResult
parameters.description: First result, pagination use.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Total number of results, used for pagination. E.g. If firstResult is 0, and maxResults is 4, then it will return 4 records starting the count from 0 (Records 0, 1, 2 and 3). Therefore, if firstResult is 10 and maxResults is 3, it will return the records 10, 11 and 12

parameters.name: distinct
parameters.description: Only filters by entities. Returns the specified entity from the model.

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: Include identifiers.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The "Q" parameter allows you to apply clauses to filter records based on specific criteria. For more information check the following documentation.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Clause order by in HQL. Field/s with which to sort the results.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields to select separated by commas.

parameters.name: noActive
parameters.description: If it is true, non-active records will also be returned.

requestBody.description: Information of the order line for being inserted

salesOrder.description: The ID of the order header.

lineNo.description: The line number of the order. Increases by 10

uOM.description: Unit of measure for the order. Use '100' for this order.

orderDate.description: The date when the order is placed. This value must be provided by the user, it should be the same as orderDate of the order header

warehouse.description: Warehouse where the order will be stored. Use  B2D40D8A5D644DD89E329DC297309055

currency.description: Currency ID for currency in which the order is made. This must be the same as the currency of the order header.

tax.description: Tax ID for the order. Use '18A499249FF74A68B79510F0AD341141' for this order.

orderedQuantity.description: The quantity of the product ordered.

post.summary: Calculate taxes in order lines of a order
post.description: This endpoint calculates the taxes of the order lines of a order. Can receive the ID of the order or the order lines. If the ID of the order is sent, the endpoint will calculate the taxes of all the order lines of the order. If the order line ID is provided, the endpoint will calculate the taxes of the single order line.

orderLineId.description: The ID of the order line.

200.description: A JSON array of objects with messages describing the result of the operation for each order line.

404.description: Wrong Endpoint, the correct endpoint is /sws/com.etendoerp.copilot.openapi.purchase.copilotws/searchBySimilarity
